Source code for sandboxKarst

from vadoseZone import LaioVadoseZone
from groundwaterZone import GroundwaterZone, LinearReservoir
from REW import REW
from matplotlib import pyplot as plt
import numpy as np
import seaborn as sns
import dis
import time
  

[docs]def main(): 
    ## time domain
    years   = 10
    Tmax    = 365*years               # days (or whatever)
    dt      = 1/24.               
    t       = np.linspace(0,Tmax,np.ceil(Tmax/dt))

    ## rainfall statistics
    alpha       = 2.5               # (cm / event)^{-1}
    L           = 10/30.            # events / day

    rainfall = generateSyntheticRainfall(len(t),L*dt,alpha)/dt 

    rew = REW([0],[0],rainfall,LaioVadoseZone,LinearReservoir,aspect=90)
    
    ## configure zones
    
    ## init. 
    vadozeStorage   = np.zeros(np.size(t))
    groundwater     = np.zeros(np.size(t))
    discharge       = np.zeros(np.size(t))
    leakage         = np.zeros(np.size(t))
    et              = np.zeros(np.size(t))
    overlandFlow    = np.zeros(np.size(t))
    intercepted     = np.zeros(np.size(t))
    
    print('#### INDIVIDUAL FUNCTION CALL #####')
    
    t0 = time.time()
    rew.vz.update(dt,20)
    rew.gz.update(dt,rew.vz.leakage) 
    t1 = time.time()

    dotTime = t1-t0
    print('rew.vz.update:\t%f'%dotTime)
    
    t0 = time.time()
    vzUpdate    = rew.vz.update
    gzUpdate    = rew.gz.update
    vzUpdate(dt,rainfall[0])     
    gzUpdate(dt,rew.vz.leakage) 
    t1 = time.time()

    preassignTime = t1-t0
    print('vzUpdate:\t%f'%preassignTime)
    
    print('Speed up:\t%f'%(dotTime/preassignTime))
    

    print('#### WHOLE LOOP #####')    
    t0 = time.time()
    for i in range(len(rainfall)):
        rew.vz.update(dt,rew.ppt[i])
        vadozeStorage[i]    = rew.vz.storage                # [cm]
        leakage[i]          = rew.vz.leakage*dt             # [cm/h]
        et[i]               = rew.vz.ET*dt                  # [cm/h]
        intercepted[i]      = rew.vz.interceptedRainfall*dt # [cm/h]
        overlandFlow[i]     = rew.vz.overlandFlow*dt        # [cm/h]
        
        rew.gz.update(dt,rew.vz.leakage) 
        groundwater[i]  = rew.gz.groundwater                # [cm]
        discharge[i]    = rew.gz.discharge*dt               # [cm/h]
    t1 = time.time()

    oldLoop = t1-t0
    print('Old Loop:\t%f'%oldLoop)

    t0 = time.time()    
    vzUpdate    = rew.vz.update
    gzUpdate    = rew.gz.update
    
    for i in range(len(rainfall)):
        vzUpdate(dt,rainfall[i])
#         vadozeStorage[i]    = rew.vz.storage                # [cm]
#         leakage[i]          = vzFlux['leakage']*dt             # [cm/h]
#         et[i]               = vzFlux['ET']*dt                  # [cm/h]
#         intercepted[i]      = vzFlux['interceptedRainfall']*dt # [cm/h]
#         overlandFlow[i]     = vzFlux['overlandFlow']*dt        # [cm/h]
        
        gzUpdate(dt,rew.vz.leakage) 
#         groundwater[i]  = rew.gz.groundwater                # [cm]
#         discharge[i]    = gzFlux['discharge']*dt               # [cm/h]
    t1 = time.time()

    newLoop = t1-t0
    print('New Loop:\t%f'%newLoop)    
    print('Scaled-up:\t%f'%(preassignTime*len(rainfall)))        
#     print('Speed up:\t%f'%(oldLoop/newLoop))
    

    
    return

    


[docs]def speedTest(): 
    ## time domain
    years   = 10
    Tmax    = 365*years               # days (or whatever)
    dt      = 1/24.               
    t       = np.linspace(0,Tmax,np.ceil(Tmax/dt))

    ## rainfall statistics
    alpha       = 2.5               # (cm / event)^{-1}
    L           = 10/30.            # events / day

    rainfall = generateSyntheticRainfall(len(t),L*dt,alpha)/dt 

    rew = REW([0],[0],rainfall,LaioVadoseZone,LinearReservoir,aspect=90)
    
    ## configure zones
    
    ## init. 
    vadozeStorage   = np.zeros(np.size(t))
    groundwater     = np.zeros(np.size(t))
    discharge       = np.zeros(np.size(t))
    leakage         = np.zeros(np.size(t))
    et              = np.zeros(np.size(t))
    overlandFlow    = np.zeros(np.size(t))
    intercepted     = np.zeros(np.size(t))
    
    print('#### CLASSES VS. NO CLASSES: %f YEARS OF ARTIFICAL DATA #####'%years)    
    
    vi      = 0.2          # [cm/d] rainfall intercepted by veg. (default: trees; 0.05 cm/d for grass)
    zr      = 75           # [cm] root zone depth
    n       = 0.45         # [] porosity
    sh      = 0.19         # [] hygroscopic point (default: loam)
    sw      = 0.24        # [] wilting point (default: loam)
    sfc     = 0.65        # [] field capacity (default: loam)
    sstar   = 0.57         # []                    
    ew      = 0.01         # [cm/d] ET at wilting point
    emax    = 0.5          # [cm/d] maximum ET (default: tree-dominated; hot growing season)
    ks      = 20           # [cm/d] saturated hydraulic conductivity (default: loam)
    b       = 14.8          # [] (default: loam)
    asd     = zr*n
    pet     = emax/asd
   
   
    k = 0.2 
  
    # internal variables
    etaw  = ew/asd
    eta   = emax/asd
    m     = ks/(asd*(np.exp(b*(1-sfc))-1))

    t0 = time.time()
    
    for i in range(len(rainfall)):
        ppt = rainfall[i]
        
        interceptedRainfall = np.min((vi,ppt))    # [cm/d]    
        R = np.max((ppt - vi,0))                       # [cm/d]
        
        s = vadozeStorage[i-1]/asd                           # []
        
        # et and lkg: [1/d]
        if s < sh: 
            pass
            # et[i] = 0 ---> already init to zero
        elif s <= sw: 
            et[i] = etaw*(s - sh)/(sw - sh)*asd
        elif s <= sstar: 
            et[i] = etaw + (pet - etaw)*(s - sw)/(sstar - sw)*asd
        else: 
            et[i] = pet*asd

        if s < sfc: leakage[i] = 0
        else: leakage[i] = m*(np.exp(b*(s - sfc))-1)*asd
  
        vadozeStorage[i]       += (R - et[i] - leakage[i])*dt       # [cm]
        overlandFlow[i]  = np.max((vadozeStorage[i] - asd,0))    # [cm/d]
        vadozeStorage[i]       = np.min((vadozeStorage[i],asd))        # [cm]
        
        discharge[i] = k*groundwater[i]             # [cm/d]
        groundwater[i] += (-discharge[i] + leakage[i])*dt      # [cm]
        
    t1 = time.time()

    noClasses = t1-t0
    print('No classes time:\t%f'%noClasses)

    ## init. 
    vadozeStorage   = np.zeros(np.size(t))
    groundwater     = np.zeros(np.size(t))
    discharge       = np.zeros(np.size(t))
    leakage         = np.zeros(np.size(t))
    et              = np.zeros(np.size(t))
    overlandFlow    = np.zeros(np.size(t))
    intercepted     = np.zeros(np.size(t))

    t0 = time.time()    
    vzUpdate    = rew.vz.update
    gzUpdate    = rew.gz.update
    
    for i in range(len(rainfall)):
        vzFlux = vzUpdate(dt,rainfall[i])
        vadozeStorage[i]    = rew.vz.storage                # [cm]
        leakage[i]          = vzFlux['leakage']*dt             # [cm/h]
        et[i]               = vzFlux['ET']*dt                  # [cm/h]
        intercepted[i]      = vzFlux['interceptedRainfall']*dt # [cm/h]
        overlandFlow[i]     = vzFlux['overlandFlow']*dt        # [cm/h]
        
        gzFlux = gzUpdate(dt,rew.vz.leakage) 
        groundwater[i]  = rew.gz.groundwater                # [cm]
        discharge[i]    = gzFlux['discharge']*dt               # [cm/h]
    t1 = time.time()

    classes = t1-t0
    print('Classes time:\t\t%f'%classes)    
    print('Fraction:\t\t%f'%(noClasses/classes))

    
    return

    
    

[docs]def waterBudget(): 
    ## time domain
    Tmax    = 365*5.               # days (or whatever)
    dt      = 1/24.               
    t       = np.linspace(0,Tmax,np.ceil(Tmax/dt))

    ## rainfall statistics
    alpha       = 2.5               # (cm / event)^{-1}
    L           = 10/30.            # events / day

    rainfall = generateSyntheticRainfall(len(t),L*dt,alpha)/dt 

    rew = REW([0],[0],rainfall,LaioVadoseZone,LinearReservoir,aspect=90)
    
    ## configure zones
    
    ## rainfall statistics sanity check
#     print('Observed mean depth: ' + str(np.mean(rainfall[np.nonzero(rainfall)])))
#     print('Predicted mean depth: ' + str(alpha))
#     
#     print('Observed number of events: ' + str(np.count_nonzero(rainfall)))
#     print('Predicted number of events: ' + str(Tmax*L))

    ## init. 
    vadozeStorage   = np.zeros(np.size(t))
    groundwater     = np.zeros(np.size(t))
    discharge       = np.zeros(np.size(t))
    leakage         = np.zeros(np.size(t))
    et              = np.zeros(np.size(t))
    overlandFlow    = np.zeros(np.size(t))
    intercepted     = np.zeros(np.size(t))

    for i in range(len(rainfall)):
        rew.vz.update(dt,rew.ppt[i])
        vadozeStorage[i]    = rew.vz.storage                # [cm]
        leakage[i]          = rew.vz.leakage*dt             # [cm/h]
        et[i]               = rew.vz.ET*dt                  # [cm/h]
        intercepted[i]      = rew.vz.interceptedRainfall*dt # [cm/h]
        overlandFlow[i]     = rew.vz.overlandFlow*dt        # [cm/h]
        
        rew.gz.update(dt,rew.vz.leakage) 
        groundwater[i]  = rew.gz.groundwater                # [cm]
        discharge[i]    = rew.gz.discharge*dt               # [cm/h]


    YtdWater       = np.cumsum(rew.ppt)*dt                  # [cm]
    YtdET          = np.cumsum(et)                          # [cm]
    YtdDischarge   = np.cumsum(discharge)                   # [cm]
    YtdOverland    = np.cumsum(overlandFlow)                # [cm]
    YtdIntercepted = np.cumsum(intercepted)                 # [cm]
    

    plt.plot(t,vadozeStorage/YtdWater,label='Vadoze Storage')
    plt.plot(t,groundwater/YtdWater,label='Groundwater Storage')    
    plt.plot(t,YtdET/YtdWater,label='Cumulative ET Volume')
    plt.plot(t,YtdIntercepted/YtdWater,label='Cumulative Intercepted Rainfall Volume')
    plt.plot(t,YtdDischarge/YtdWater,label='Cumulative Discharge Volume')
#     plt.plot(t,YtdOverland/YtdWater,label='Cumulative Overland Flow Volume')
    plt.plot(t,(vadozeStorage+YtdET+groundwater+YtdIntercepted+YtdDischarge+YtdOverland)/YtdWater,label='Total Volume')
    plt.ylabel('Portion of Water Balance []')
    plt.xlabel('Time [d]')
    plt.legend()
    plt.ylim(0,1.25)
    plt.show()

    



[docs]def generateSyntheticRainfall(numIntervals=365*24,L=10/30/24,alpha=20):
    ''' Set up to generate 1 year of rainfall hourly rainfall data with 10 events per month
        and an average depth of 20mm 
    '''
    return np.array([np.random.exponential(alpha) if np.random.uniform() > np.exp(-L) else 0.0 for i in range(numIntervals)])

    
    
    

[docs]def LaioValidation():
    rew = REW([0],[0],[0],LaioVadoseZone,GroundwaterZone,aspect=90)
        
    dt  = 1/24.
    T   = 30
    
    t                   = np.linspace(0,T,np.ceil(T/dt))
    vadozeStorage       = np.zeros(np.size(t))
    
    ## init. 
    soilMoisture    = np.zeros(np.size(t))
    groundwater     = np.zeros(np.size(t))
    discharge       = np.zeros(np.size(t))
    leakage         = np.zeros(np.size(t))
    et              = np.zeros(np.size(t))
    overlandFlow    = np.zeros(np.size(t))
    intercepted     = np.zeros(np.size(t))
    
    s0  = 0.9
    rew.vz.storage = s0*rew.vz.asd
    
    soilMoisture[0] = s0
    for i in range(1,len(t)):        
        rew.vz.update(dt,0)
        soilMoisture[i] = rew.vz.storage/rew.vz.asd


    closedForm = np.array([rew.vz.closed_form(tt,s0) for tt in t])
    
    plt.plot(t,soilMoisture,label='Soil Moisture: Simulation')
    plt.plot(t,closedForm,'--',label='Soil Moisture: Closed Form')
    plt.legend()
    plt.xlabel('Time [d]')
    plt.ylabel('Soil moisture []')
    plt.title('Laio model validation')
    
    plt.figure()
    plt.plot(t,np.abs(soilMoisture-closedForm)/closedForm*100)
    plt.title('Validation: Laio simulation vs. Laio closed form')
    plt.xlabel('Time [d]')
    plt.ylabel('Absolute Percent Error')
    
    plt.show()





[docs]def memoryAddress(input): return hex(id(input))


if __name__ == '__main__': speedTest()
